author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Central Crime Branch of Chennai City Police has arrested a couple on charges of cheating several job aspirants.

In a complaint in December last year, Elangovan from Vellore district alleged that P.K. Vairamani (31) and his wife Uma Maheshwari (32), of Noombal, had taken Rs. 30 lakh after assuring several young people of overseas jobs.

A senior CCB officer said the duo neither got them the jobs nor did they repay the money. Meanwhile, they closed down their firm in Thandalam and fled. Following a complaint, the CCB team arrested the couple remanded them in Puzhal prison after producing them before a judicial magistrate.
title: Couple held for cheating job aspirants of Rs. 30 lakh
